description: Justaway is a merchandise-line of dull looking figurines created by http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou]. In truth these small toys are actually destructive bombs that http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou] sells to the http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi] without attracting the attention of the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] as they only appear to be harmless toys.
name: Justaway
